snippet.title: Bing begins to entertain with music, movies, TV, and games
snippet.description: ...Microsoft has updated its search engine with Bing Entertainment, a new section that specializes in music, movies, TV, and games.Bing Music lets you discover and sample more than 5 million songs and lyrics for free, including search results tailored for songs, artists, albums, and lyrics. snippet.description: ...Last Friday saw the much-anticipated PS3 title LittleBigPlanet delayed; lyrics in one of the games were deemed offensive by some Islamic gamers. snippet.title: Easter eggs may get apps approved, but could hurt App Store
snippet.description: ...One iPhone developer has managed to skirt an App Store rejection by effectively hiding some "objectionable" song lyrics behind an Easter egga kind of hidden feature that many programmers add to software.Jelle Prins created an iPhone app called Lyrics that allows a user to search for the lyrics to any songeven NWA's "F*ck Tha Police" or Rage Against The Machine's &quo...

snippet.title: Hands-on: Google music streams useful, not revolutionary
snippet.description: ...As expected, Google announced Wednesday that it was indeed adding music streams to its search results thanks to a partnership with Lala, MySpace (with streaming from iLike), Rhapsody, and imeem.
